_description: Love God who died for thee, a tag in the Fasciculus morum — six lines, tail-rhyme (aabccb)

BodLauMis213.Transcription:
loue god þou þat loued þeþat for þe tholede
                    dethe on tre& brogth þou out of helleloue hym with herte with
                    soule & thoghtþat þe now hatȝ well dere a
                    boghtþen ony tonge kan telle

BodLauMis111.Transcription:
Loue god thow man that louith theffor the he sufferd dethe vp on a
                    treeAnd brouȝt the oute of helleLoue hym with herte soule and
                    thouȝteWhich he hathe derer boughteThan any tonge can
                    telle

Bod410.Transcription:
Loue god þu þat loued þeþat for þe tholed
                    deth on tre…þat þe now has well dere a bowghtþan
                    any tonge can telle

BodRawC670.Transcription:
Loue god þat loued theÞat for þe tholed deth on
                    treeAnd broght þe oute of helleLoue hym with hert sowle and
                    þoghtÞat þe now has wel derre boghtÞen any tonge
                    can telle

CamGon71.First Lines:
Loue god þat loued þeþat for þi loue dyed on
                    tre…
CamGon71.Last Lines:
…þat þe now wele dere as bogthþan any tong may
                    tell

CamGon364.First Lines:
Loue god þou man þat loued þeffor þe he suffred
                    deth on þe tre…
CamGon364.Last Lines:
…þat he now hath ful dere bowthþan ony tonge can
                    telle

EDU82.First Lines:
love god man that loved theAnd for the suffurd dethe on
                    tree…
EDU82.Last Lines:
…ffor he the hathe dere a bowthtThen any tonge can
                    tell

Lincoln44.Transcription:
loue god þu þat louyþ þeþat for thi dolede
                    de on treAnd brouth þe out of helleloue hym wyþ hert &
                    saule & þouȝtþat þe haþ wel dere y
                    bouthþan any tonge ma tel

Spalding.Transcription:
Lofe þu godd þat loffes theffor þe he deyd on þe
                    treeand boght þe out of hellloffe hym with hert with saule and
                    thoghtþat with his blode so dere þe boghtþat no tonge
                    it may tell

WorcF19.First Lines:
Loue god þow þat louid þeþat for þy loue
                    deyde on tre…
WorcF19.Last Lines:
…þat þe now hat wel dyrer bouȝtþan eu[e]r
                    tonge can telle
